name: Jenny Wilson
comments: The food was excellent ans so wa the service. I had the musroom ristto with scallops which was awesome. I had a burger over greens(gluten-free) which was also very good.They were very consientious about gluten allergies.

name: Dianne Russell
comments: We enjoyed the Eggs Benedict served on homemade focaccia bread and hot coffee. Perfect service

name: Devon Lane
comments: Normally wings are wings but theirs are lean meaty and tender and
